title: Percentages
text: Percentages are often useful when comparing two things with different metrics of measurement because a percent does not have any units.

title: Percent Variance
text: Percent variance is the percent difference between two numbers.

title: Percent Deviation
text: Percent deviation is how far from the original percentage a new percentage seems to be.

title: Percent Difference
text: This is the subtraction of two percent values from each other.

title: Percent Change
text: This is a calculated change converted into a percentage.
